title: Enhancing the reaction kinetics and structural stability of high-voltage LiCoO2via polyanionic species anchoring
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,4147-4156
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00726C, Paper
Wei Zheng, Gemeng Liang, Hao Guo, Jingxi Li, Jinshuo Zou, Jodie A. Yuwono, Hongbo Shu, Shilin Zhang, Vanessa K. Peterson, Bernt Johannessen, Lars Thomsen, Wenbin Hu, Zaiping Guo
Anchored polyanionic species acting as micro funnels boost the Li+ kinetics and enhance the structural stability of high-voltage LiCoO2.
